attributes.action: Create an independent body to investigate whether a huge partially hidden political and economic agenda exists or not for the creation of a One World Government/New World Order which may or may not be Socialistic, Fascistic or Totalitarian in character, or a combination of these.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Note to the e petitions team: this is in no way an attempt to be humourous but is seriously questioning the rumours/hidden agenda regarding a march towards a one world government (which may be a socialist ideal) also sometimes referred to as the New World Order. To dismiss this as humourous leads me to suspect you don't want this issue to be raised at all thus confirming that the agenda is real.

reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
